Reviews.Title: “SMALL Rooms, No Elevator”
Reviews.Author: Silverspringer1
Reviews.Content: stayed night recently canal view breakfast ground floor looked stucco wall feet hardly space luggage door hit bed 90 degrees bed wall wardrobe foot space foot bed allowed navigation window wardrobe check view air shaft adjacent stucco wall bed pretty soft overall quaint threadbare worst elevator third call fourth floor worn somewhat slippery marble stairs left lugging luggage living backpack week cruise rolling bags location minute piazza san marco suggested route discovered fairly close closer rialto bridge vaporetto water taxi stops location plenty options nearby stay

Reviews.Title: “Decent Venice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kfitz1742
Reviews.Content: husband recently stayed five nights hotel served purpose stay venice breakfast adequate coffee biscuits croissants cheese ham etc cereals choose decent sized posts complained plenty suit carry pack bathroom clean water pressure nice windows wide didnt view 201 little alley lead residents homes cleaned day fresh towels daily complaint beds horrible sleeping floor twins pushed falling crack bring foam liner nice nights sleep walking day believe hotel advertises free wifi 3euro hour reception desk helpful reservations recommendations requested nice sun deck top perfect drinking prosecco relaxing day sight seeing questions

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: samm4312
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel 30 december location perfect minutes san marcs piazza rialto bridge staff helpful despite lovely clean relatively comfortable beds own bathroom didnt hygiene cleanliness breakfast basic variety cereals fruits wouldnt recommend family staying time stay heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Poor hygiene”
Reviews.Author: JerryBr
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location fantastic return entering bathroom hotel doesnt care hygiene lots mold shower fungus faucet urine outside toilet cleanup reception clean toilet outside dried urine floor cover toilet toilet hall poor ventilation bathroom started smelling bad day hold breath dont care sizes quality breakfast citytrip ok 3 star hotel nice breakfast btw ive unacceptable return beautifull city gladly pay little bit

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value for the money”
Reviews.Author: nford333
Reviews.Content: im glad werent swayed negative reviews pleasantly surprised stay hotel visited 2009 location fantastic close st marks square wonderful dining options top location free daily breakfast top nice touch noticed lot people complained bathroom size standardsize compared european cities weve stayed bathroom nicely appointed clean fivestar luxury hotel unfair rate standards nice clean centrallylocated hotel exceptional value definitely return

Reviews.Title: “So Venetian, rooms like stage sets.”
Reviews.Author: abnicho
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel respects venice standards price value book direct hotel rate cant understand negative opinions expressed unless prefer blandness cloned multinational sameness hotel venetian gorgeous plus clean friendly helpful safe location buffet breakfast gondolas sliding past huge picture window loved

Reviews.Title: “OK at best”
Reviews.Author: Zetravler
Reviews.Content: hotel location minute walk st marco square etc id prefer stay elsewhere hotel walls super thin lead little sleep people partying hours nights clean shabby noise bad breakfast ok hotel fine

Reviews.Title: “On balance a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: walkerbarometers
Reviews.Content: reading previous reviews prior entered mirrored friendly attentive english speaking staff bedroom tarts allegedly crimson sumptuous tapestry wallpaper overpowering expense spared double par size venice hotel clean appointed location 3 minutes walk st marks breakfast bar canal view fare limited mediocre quality fruit juice

Reviews.Title: “ok for one day only (room 207)”
Reviews.Author: chia2
Reviews.Content: describe service experienced black haired receptionist friendly receptionists dont speak english thank god speak bit italian reserved wrong date changing plans dont loose money hotel tell earlier tell liked colors rich venetian red gold blue pressure talk location amenities location price eur 50 night double feb 2010 liked stairway marble nice lighting narrow steep liked breakfast perfectly marble tiles tables bar look canal eating breakfast breakfast price eur 50 choose coffee nescafe hot chocolate tea served self service fruit juice ot 100 cheese ham salami bread buns croissant 2 sweet 3 sorts cereal canned fruit butter nutella honey marmelade liked size softness beds woke morning rested truck ran hot air conditioning refurbished 2009 maybe bathroom tiny shower attached partly broken look silver worn tap etc shower noticed black spots edges shower possibly mould renewed wash basin clogged instantly bidet tap looked toilet press flush water covered carpet fabric dirty bothered floor uneven cabinet looke tip 56 hangers hang clothes real cupboard floor suitcases mini bar internet pay lobby stay hotel day
